attr.title: Madhouse
attr.desc: MADHOUSE is a horror action RPG where chibi characters slash and blast enemies in blood-soaked combat. Explore a dreary open world in the story campaign, or fight friends in the chaotic local 4-player versus mode. With retro pixel art and punk horror grit, it delivers macabre, thrilling action. WARNING! This game contains depictions of violence and foul language!
attr.inst: Download the DEMO from Steam and add the game files to `madhouse/assets`. Wishlist the game!
